=database structure for User Information (LDAP)=

users [ username pk char, password char, password_strength char, encryption_key char, is_encrypted boolean, password_expiration_date date, first_name char, last_name char, middle_name char, secondary_email char, title char, company char, summary text, last_login_ip char, enabled boolean, lock_reason char, secret_question char, secret_answer char, creation_date date, last_modified_date date, is_deleted boolean ]

user_login_ip_audit [username, login_ip, audit_date]

user_login_lock_audit [username, lock_status, audit_date, lock_reason]

user_profile_audit [ username, first_name, last_name, middle_name, title, company, summary,creation_date, last_modified_date, audit_user, audit_date ]

user_address [ id pk auto increment, userame, type, street, city, state, zipcode, country, is_public, creation_date, last_modified_date, is_deleted ]

user_address_audit[id, userame, type, street, city, state, zipcode, country, is_public, creation_date, last_modified_date, audit_user, audit_date  ]


user_phone [ id pk auto increment, username, type, phone_number char, is_public boolean, creation_date, last_modified_date, is_deleted ] 

user_phone_audit [id, username, type, phone_number, is_public, creation_date, last_modified_date, audit_user, audit_date ]

user_old_password_audit [ username, password, password_strength, creation_date, last_modified_date, audit_date ]

user_community[ username pk, company pk, enabled, creation_date, last_modified_date , expiration_date, creation_user, last_modified_user, is_deleted]

user_community_audit [ username, company, enabled, creation_date, last_modified_date , expiration_date, creation_user, last_modified_user, audit_user, audit_date ]

user_roles [ username pk, role pk, creation_date, last_modified_date, is_deleted  ]

user_roles_audit [username, role, creation_date, last_modified_date, audit_user, audit_date  ]

role [ role pk, type, description, creation_date, last_modified_date, is_deleted  ]
